org.conqat.lib.commons.digest

Class Digester

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.digest.Digester

  • public class Digester
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility functions for creation of digests.

    • Method Detail

      • createMD5Digest

        public static java.lang.String createMD5Digest(java.lang.String base)
        Computes an MD5 hash for a string. The hash is always 32 characters long and only uses characters from [0-9A-F].

      • createMD5Digest

        public static java.lang.String createMD5Digest(byte[] data)
        Computes an MD5 hash for a byte array. The hash is always 32 characters long and only uses characters from [0-9A-F].

      • createSHA1Digest

        public static java.lang.String createSHA1Digest(java.lang.String base)
        Computes a SHA-1 hash for a string. The hash is always 40 characters long and only uses characters from [0-9A-F].

      • createSHA1Digest

        public static java.lang.String createSHA1Digest(byte[] data)
        Computes a SHA-1 hash for a string. The hash is always 40 characters long and only uses characters from [0-9A-F].

      • createSHA256Digest

        public static java.lang.String createSHA256Digest(java.lang.String base)
        Computes a SHA-256 hash for a string. The hash is always 64 characters long and only uses characters from [0-9A-F].

      • createSHA256Digest

        public static java.lang.String createSHA256Digest(byte[] data)
        Computes a SHA-256 hash for a string. The hash is always 64 characters long and only uses characters from [0-9A-F].

      • createMD5Digest

        public static java.lang.String createMD5Digest(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> bases)
        Computes an MD5 hash for a collection of strings. The strings are sorted before MD5 computation, so that the resulting MD5 hash is independent of the order of the strings in the collection.

      • createBinarySHA1Digest

        public static byte[] createBinarySHA1Digest(byte[] data)
        Computes an SHA-1 hash for a byte array and returns the binary hash (i.e. no string conversion).

      • createBinaryMD5Digest

        public static byte[] createBinaryMD5Digest(byte[] data)
        Computes an MD5 hash for a byte array and returns the binary hash (i.e. no string conversion).

      • getMD5

        public static java.security.MessageDigest getMD5()
        Returns MD5 digester or throws an AssertionError if the digester could not be located.

      • getSHA1

        public static java.security.MessageDigest getSHA1()
        Returns SHA-1 digester or throws an AssertionError if the digester could not be located.

      • getSHA256

        public static java.security.MessageDigest getSHA256()
        Returns SHA-256 digester or throws an AssertionError if the digester could not be located.
